meanings.definition: A daughter of one's brother or sister.
meanings.sent1: My niece loves to play with her dolls.
meanings.sent2: I am going to visit my niece this weekend.
meanings.sent3: My niece always makes me laugh with her silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her smile is like a ray of sunshine, my niece brightens up my day.
meanings.sent5: Every time I see my niece, my heart fills with joy.

meanings.definition: The female child of a sibling.
meanings.sent1: She is my niece, my sister's daughter.
meanings.sent2: My niece is growing up so fast.
meanings.sent3: I told my niece she could have all the cookies, and she was overjoyed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter is music to my ears, my niece brings happiness wherever she goes.
meanings.sent5: The bond between an aunt and her niece is truly special.
